001package reversi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Optional;
006
007public class Computer extends Player {
008    public Computer(Integer index, Table table) {
009        super(index, "com", table);
010    }
011
012    public void placePiece() {
013        List<Integer> aList = new ArrayList<>();
014        List<Grid> grids = table.getGrids();
015        grids.forEach(item -> aList.add(reversiNumber(item)));
016        Optional<Integer> max = aList.stream().max(Integer::compareTo);
017        Integer index = aList.indexOf(max.get());
018        Grid aGrid = grids.get(index);
019        aGrid.placePiece(piece);
020        reversi(aGrid);
021        return;
022    }
023
024    public void reversi(Grid aGrid) {
025        List<Grid> nextGrids = aGrid.getNextGrids();
026        nextGrids.stream().filter(item -> super.reversiNext(item, nextGrids.indexOf(item)))
027                .forEach(item -> item.placePiece(piece));
028        return;
029    }
030
031    public Integer reversiNumber(Grid aGrid) {
032        if (!table.isPlacePiece(this, aGrid))
033            return 0;
034        List<Integer> aList = new ArrayList<>();
035        List<Grid> nextGrids = aGrid.getNextGrids();
036        nextGrids.stream().filter(item -> this.reversiNext(item, nextGrids.indexOf(item)))
037                .forEach(item -> aList.add(reversiColumnNumber(item, nextGrids.indexOf(item), 0)));
038        Integer sum = aList.stream().mapToInt(value -> value).sum();
039        return sum;
040    }
041
042    public Boolean reversiNext(Grid aGrid, Integer index) {
043        Integer color = aGrid.getPiece().getColor();
044        if (color > 0 && color != piece.getColor())
045            return true;
046        return false;
047    }
048
049    public Integer reversiColumnNumber(Grid aGrid, Integer index, Integer number) {
050        Integer aGridColor = aGrid.getPiece().getColor();
051        if (aGridColor <= 0)
052            return 0;
053        if (aGridColor == piece.getColor())
054            return number;
055        return reversiColumnNumber(aGrid.getNextGrid(index), index, number + 1);
056    }
057
058    public Boolean isComputer() {
059        return true;
060    }
061}
